1. OpenAI’s latest step towards advanced artificial intelligence  The Economist
  2. GPT-5 is here  OpenAI
  3. Sam Altman tries to calm furious ChatGPT Plus subscribers by reversing one of GPT-5’s big downgrades  TechRadar
  4. AI Won’t Kill Software. It Will Simply Give It New Life.  Barron's
  5. ‘It Was Very Sudden’: ChatGPT Users Mourned The Loss Of GPT-5’s Predecessor  Forbes

item.title: OpenAI beats Elon Musk's Grok in AI chess tournament - BBC
item.description:
1. OpenAI beats Elon Musk's Grok in AI chess tournament  BBC
  2. ChatGPT beats Grok in AI chess final, Gemini finishes third, Elon Musk says…  Hindustan Times
  3. Rethinking how we measure AI intelligence  The Keyword
  4. Elon Musk Takes on Sam Altman, This Time Over the Chessboard  Bloomberg.com
  5. OpenAI's o3 Crushes Grok 4 In Final, Wins Kaggle's AI Chess Exhibition Tournament  Chess.com
